DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Face Paints - Sparkle Orange (18 ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo Sparkle Orange Face Paint applies smoothly, can be easily blended and will dry in about 30 seconds to a streak-free, durable finish. Snazaroo Sparkle Face Paint has pearlized pigments that give a lovely metallic finish, but without the metallic pigments.
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
Snazaroo Sparkle Orange Face Paint gives brightly colored, totally opaque coverage and comes in a 0.6 ounces (18 ml) refill size container.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.6 ounces (18 ml) Snazaroo Sparkle Orange Face Paint Container is good for 100 full face or 2,500 cheek art designs (approx 2in x 2in size)
Tons of colors to choose from
One of the most popular face paints in the world
